name: Crazy Traffic 3D
description:
Your mission is to collect cash and avoid the police!

This is a game about cars and traffic. What you have to do is control the cars and avoid the police or make them crashing into each other.

Is it easy, right? Come to show your drift skill. Can you escape the heavy traffic?

Features:

One button control game.
Coupe, moto, Monster Truck, bull and a huge stickman
